en.title: Google Colabs
description: > Note: This colab is for **inference** only.
> Note: This colab is for **training** only.
### RVC colabs translated to other languages
> **Nota**: Os dois colabs acima faz a separação da voz do instrumental, aplica a voz modelo e junta novamente com o instrumental
> 💡 **Dica**: Use o comando `-rvc_br` para guias em **Português**

## • Perfecting Audio Isolation on Low-End Rigs: A Practical Guide (by Litsa The Dancer and Faze Masta)
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HmkG9cmL8SLX7-vJcPT1-1KgUQtCrwXB8CicYmG4LW8/edit?usp=sharing`)

## • Guide: Gathering and Isolating Audio (by SCRFilms)
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wTJ_wutDqEtsA99BJOXDDGax25pPIDE84O5E2Rio5Qk/edit#heading=h.g896c5vbh0dv`)

## • How to make a good model All-In-One guide by LUSBERT
https://rentry.org/RVC_making-models
- https://goyo.app/ (Note that this plugin is for clean ups only, like removing background noise, reverb, ambience or sustained sounds)')
> **Tip:** Use `-colab` command if you're looking for audio separation/isolation colabs.
> ⚠️ Aviso: O Kaggle está banindo contas que utilizam RVC na plataforma, use por sua conta e risco.
- [Como fazer AI COVER - Método NOVO](https://youtu.be/QTz18CSyYmE) (créditos **AI HUB BRASIL**)
- [COMO TREINAR UM MODELO DE VOZ PARA O RVC NO CELULAR](https://youtu.be/PoNoaI8DFP8?si=VccKwtkEKgAcaPNn) (créditos **Vector Lua**)
- [Como fazer Deep Fake (Maneira Fácil) - Android e PC](https://youtu.be/Z_k1YV_Tn40?si=Fu4hmEZOPOuGZ0On) (créditos **AI HUB BRASIL**)'
> 💡 **Dica**: Use o comando `-colabs_br` para links de colabs traduzidos em **Português**

en.title: Ran out of GPU?
description: While training or inferring, if you encounter a dialog that tells you `Cannot connect to GPU backend`, your daily usage of GPU in Google Colab ended. You can either:

en.title: Realtime Voice Changer
description:
## 1. (Local) W-Okada Voice Changer
This has more options and is somewhat more convenient to use than Real-time RVC.
**GUIDE**: https://rentry.co/VoiceChangerGuide

## 2. (Online) W-Okada - Colab Version
A free, online version of W-Okada that allows you to run code on Google’s powerful GPUs.
**GUIDE**: https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vTIceEcBfS6Zqolv_QEysrFfI_EJikPxozWptP_EjkpLVl-l-gdo-ijBonQMTviAHEYm5emmd9k9TdC/pub

## 3. (Local) Real-time conversion of RVC
It's more accurate but requires a Nvidia RTX card.
**GUIDE**: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1haQAWn4Hnh3Aq8SSGX0tBSY3rDzjYJAcczrUy63oTTs/edit
